attributes.action: Hold an independent enquiry on MPs betrayal of the 2016 referendum results.
attributes.additional_details: Ian Blackford said “Parliament had shown its will” but Parliament should not have its own will it should represent the will of the people.
attributes.background: There were only two options on the referendum paper ‘Remain’ or ‘Leave’. The over whelming majority wanted to leave based on that paper with no stipulations on how we left. It’s time Parliament listened to the people.
